channel.title: Html/template on Errors in Go - Learn how to fix common errors in Go
channel.description: Recent content in Html/template on Errors in Go - Learn how to fix common errors in Go

item.title: this-is-not-used
item.description: What causes the error? This issue is easily caused by some of the same issues that cause the os.ErrNotExist error. As a result, I suggest you start with the os.ErrNotExist article. Make sure you understand how Go reads opens files relative to where it is run (not relative to where your source code is), and then see if you can figure out the issue. If that doesn’t work feel free to reach out - jon@calhoun.
